page.title: 15Youth Activites Centre.
page.content: The Y.A.C. stands for{Youth {Activities Centre.}It is in {Knightsdale Road,}near Weymouth Swimming Pool. There are over{forty {clubs}held at the Y.A.C.{eg.netball, {football,archery, table tennis, {canoeing,sailing and Life Saving.} I go to Chess Club at the Y.A.C. in Winter. I also do fencing and archery there. Inside the Y.A.C. there is a{Coffee {Bar,}seats and a pool table.There are {Lecture rooms}and{big rooms}for {different activities. There are only{seven full time {staff and thirty part time staff}that work at the Y.A.C. From the{1st-6th {July}311{school children,}261{youths and 105{adults}used the Centre. This means that{677 people used the Centre during the week. -David Payne.
